name: A Short Rest
description:
A Short Rest is a digital collection of maps and cards, to be used as story or world-building for RPG games. 

It is a pastoral fantasy around the concept of a "short rest"(in D&D, for instance) - what if these short rests were actually taken somewhere pleasant?

MAPS

There are seven 12x9 maps in this pack, all watercolor and ink illustrations by Shing Yin Khor. They are provided as individual high res .jpgs.

CARDS

There are 50 cards, all watercolor and ink illustrations by Shing Yin Khor, of charming NPCs and strange and delightful (and sometimes perfectly ordinary)objects and items you might find at a roadside vendor or traveling merchant. They are provided as individual high res .jpgs.

PRINTING and LICENSE

There is a .pdf included in the file download that suggests printing options. 

The card deck of 50 cards can be printed using Moo Printfinity for $19.99. 

The maps can be printed at any print shop, online or in-person, or at home(they are 9"x12" and may have to be scaled down for most home printers). They look great on uncoated paper.
